div.bibl: Svenska Kuriren, March 21, 1927 ALD. NELSON TO HEAD JANITORS' UNION

body.p: Alderman Oscar F. Nelson of the Ward recently was chosen president of the Chicago Apartment Janitors' Union. One of his very first acts in this capacity was to formulate a contract, or agreement, between the said Union and the Apartment Building Owners' League which has been accepted by both parties.
Mr. Nelson is an attorney-at-law by profession and is the Republican floor leader in the City Council.
